subject: associations: rainier: Add associations for assembly
commitMessage:
associations: rainier: Add associations for assembly

This commit adds associations for all the inventory that
gets represented as Assemblies in Redfish.

Change-Id: Id4e9e4ac870e5bed665462d161abde00c4b85554
Signed-off-by: Vishwanatha Subbanna <vishwa@linux.vnet.ibm.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Ok-To-Test+1

User approved, CI ok to start

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

Build Successful 

https://jenkins.openbmc.org/job/ci-openbmc/4031/ : SUCCESS

Patch Set 1:

Build Successful 

IBM Hardware CI : witherspoon hardware tests passed
